oai_dc:dc.dc:title: OFFSHORE TSUNAMI PROFILES OBSERVED AT THE COASTAL WAVE STATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nagai, Toshihiko
Hashimoto, Noriaki
Shimizu, Kazuyoshi
Kitamura, Fujio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: tsunami
offshore tsunami
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents offshore tsunami profiles observed by NOWPHAS (Nationwide Ocean Wave Information Network for Ports and Harbours) wavemeasuring instruments installed at various coastal wave stations and tide stations in Japan. Included are wave profiles of damage-inflicting tsunamis generated by the 1993 Hokkaido-Southwest Earthquake, the 1994 Hokkaido-Eastoff Earthquake, the 1996 Iri-Anjaya Earthquake, and other smaller recently occurring tsumamis. Also presented are characteristiscs and phenomena of interest clarifed through various analyses performed on observational data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
